summary: The diff updates the ANTF Structure page with an English hierarchy narrative (SIGP head, HQ Pune, DIG at HQ, SP (Ops) Pune/Nagpur units) and adds a range-division list plus an Appendix “A” section shell. However, the diff does not show the required Legal Advisor/Forensic Expert sections, the Dy.SP staffing composition statement, nor sufficient evidence of the requested spelling/terminology cleanups across Appendix “A”. It also includes changes to project metadata files that were not requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Include the Legal Advisor and Forensic Expert role descriptions exactly as provided (Legal Advisor responsibilities list in order; Forensic Expert description and future-scope note).
missing_requirements.reason: In the shown AntfStructurePage content, only the hierarchy and the beginning of Appendix “A” are present; there is no clearly labeled Legal Advisor section, no responsibilities list, and no Forensic Expert section/description visible in the diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Include staffing composition statement for each Dy.SP (Ops) Division: total 31 personnel and breakdown (01 Dy.SP, 02 PI, 02 API, 02 PSI, 24 officials) exactly as specified.
missing_requirements.reason: The displayed content includes hierarchy text and a list of divisions, but no staffing strength statement or role breakdown is shown.

missing_requirements.requirement: Correct obvious spelling/terminology issues in Appendix “A” and related copy (e.g., Konkan/Kokan, Commissionerate spelling, place-name consistency) while preserving meaning.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows an Appendix “A” heading and the start of a district list, but the district items are truncated and there is no explicit evidence of correcting the cited typos (e.g., Commissionerate/Commissionrate variants) across the Appendix lists.

hallucinated_features.description: Project metadata/state tracking updates unrelated to the requested ANTF Structure page content changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest is limited to updating the ANTF Structure reference page content/presentation; it does not request updating project_state.json or adding/updating feature request tracking entries.

hallucinated_features.description: Updates to a repository-wide frontend file summary artifact.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not request regenerating or modifying documentation/summary files like frontend-file-summaries.txt.
